issue.title: [C++] Multithreaded Read Test Failing on Arch Linux
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1657](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1657). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is appearing in parquet-cpp, but is caused by a recent change in arrow to privatize the use of `std::mutex` so I'm opening the JIRA here.

This doesn't show up in CI, but shows up reliably on my personal Arch Linux installation.
